entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
